name: Meeting attendees - Small
description: Default number of attendees for a small meeting
sources: Divide the cost of a small meeting (500.00 USD) by 35.00 USD per meeting attendee, rounded to the nearest 5.

name: Meeting attendees - Medium
description: Default number of attendees for a medium meeting
sources: Divide the cost of a small meeting (1,000.00 USD) by 35.00 USD per meeting attendee, rounded to the nearest 5.

name: Meeting attendees - Large
description: Default number of attendees for a large meeting
sources: Divide the cost of a small meeting (3,000.00 USD) by 35.00 USD per meeting attendee, rounded to the nearest 5.
